SEARCH
Package gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.plugin.security

Class SignatureKeyProviderPlatformPlugin

java.lang.Object
gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.plugin.security.SignatureKeyProviderPluginBase
gw.api.modules.rest.framework.v1.plugin.security.SignatureKeyProviderPlatformPlugin
All Implemented Interfaces:
SignatureKeyProviderPlugin, InternalPlugin, IStartablePlugin, InitializablePlugin, Remote
public class SignatureKeyProviderPlatformPlugin extends SignatureKeyProviderPluginBase
Implementation of the SignatureKeyProviderPlugin that uses the JWK specification to fetch keys using the well-known endpoint (/.well-known/openid-configuration).

Behavior: 1. The JWK key set corresponding to the issuer URL will be looked up from the cache. If none is cached, The issuer URL will be used to look up the key set endpoint from the well-known endpoint. 2. The call to getPublicKey() will lookup the "kid" header from the JWT and use this to find the corresponding public key from the key set. If this key id is not present in the key set (because of key rotation), The key set will be re-fetched exactly once using the same steps as listed above. 3. If a key is found, it is returned. If no key is found null is returned. Clients are expected to reject authorization of the JWT if no key is found.

Note: symmetric algorithms are not currently supported by this plugin.

Configuration of this plugin should specify the following parameters: 1. allowedIssuers - A comma-separated list of URLs that are whitelisted issuers.

    • getSecretKey

      public SecretKey getSecretKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
      This implementation does not support symmetric keys.
      Parameters:
      signatureAlgorithm - The cryptographic algorithm
      qualifiers - The optional qualifiers used to resolve the appropriate key
      Returns:
      The secret key
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - This method is not supported by this implementation

    • getPublicKey

      public PublicKey getPublicKey(JwsAlgorithm signatureAlgorithm, Map<String,Object> qualifiers)
      Returns the public key, or null if no key found.
      Parameters:
      signatureAlgorithm - The cryptographic algorithm of the key
      qualifiers - The optional qualifiers used to resolve the appropriate key: must contain "issuer" and "kid" keys
      Returns:
      The public key, or null if no key found that matches "kid"
